news.headline: Remember that the built-in type Boolean can hold only one of two possible objects: True or False
news.description: https://www.w3schools.com/xml/dom_nodes_remove.asp The examples use the XML file books.xml. Remove an element node. This example uses removeChild() to remove the first <book> element. Remove the current element node. Remove a text node. Clear the text of a text node. Remove an attribute by name. Remove attributes by object.
